long_description: The Skirt Sports Cover Girl Skirt has triathlon details and smart styling that you'll appreciate during race day, including snaps for your race bib and quick-drying fabric for the swim. Quick-drying, sun protective fabric is a nylon/spandex blend that provides unhindered movement while running or cycling. Stay-put grippers at waistband keep the skirt right where you want it. 5-inch zippered pocket on back right side keeps essentials secure. The Skirt Sports Cover Girl Skirt features a slit on the right side for freedom of movement. Closeout.
short_description: The Skirt Sports Cover Girl Skirt has triathlon details and smart styling that you'll appreciate during race day, including snaps for your race bib and quick-drying fabric for the swim.
